name: Tapper (itch)
description:
The best one FREE time-killer and just beautiful game. Dive in marvelous and captivate world of the one click. Implemented simple and convenient mechanics help you start play without any efforts. The all what are you need, it’s faster tap on circle, if you miss or be late YOU lose! Have fun and hurry up!)

Features: 
•Simple and wonderful interface
•Sinking in atmosphere gameplay 
•Elementary mechanics
•One click game
•Competition with people all over the world 
•Best time-killer

Game has inner purchases
